LocaleResource.Value: Don't send order items on PayPal. Customer will not see products from the order on PayPal site, he will see only total amount.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalPlus.DescriptionTransaction.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Description of the transaction in PayPal store. By default your customer will see this message 'NopCommerce PayPal Plus.'.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalPlus.AdditionalFeePercentage.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Determines whether to apply a percentage additional fee to the order total. If not enabled, a fixed value is used.

LocaleResource.Name: FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalPlus.WrongOrderTotal
LocaleResource.Value: Error. Order total couldn't be calculated.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalPlus.Description
LocaleResource.Value:
If you're using this gateway ensure that your primary store currency is supported by Paypal.

To configure plugin follow these steps:
1. Log into your Developer PayPal account (click here to create your account).
2. Click on My Apps & Credentials from the Dashboard.
3. Create new REST API app.
4. Copy your Client ID and Secret key below.
5. To be able to use recurring payments you need to set the webhook ID. You can get it manually in your PayPal account (enter the URL https://www.yourStore.com/plugins/paymentpaypalplus/webhook below REST API application credentials), or automatically by pressing "Get webhook ID" button (not visible when running the site locally).

Important.
You should connect to PayPal support and ask them to enable PayPal Plus for your PayPal account.
By default PayPal Plus is disabled. After speaking with you PayPal support will verify you PayPal account and verify your store. PayPal will write you when you will be able to use PayPal Plus.

LocaleResource.Name: Admin.FoxNetSoft.Plugin.Payments.PayPalPlus.InstallationAndConfiguring
LocaleResource.Value: Installation and configuring plug-in at our site
